sqlMap.select: select * from scr_pagerepository where bookid=#idLibro# AND fdrid=#idRegistro# AND DELETEDATE IS NULL

SELECT * FROM scr_pagerepository PA WHERE PA.bookid=#idLibro# AND PA.fdrid=#idRegistro# AND PA.DELETEDATE IS NULL AND (PA.FLAG IS NULL OR PA.FLAG = (SELECT NVL(MAX(PA1.FLAG), 0) FROM scr_pagerepository PA1 WHERE PA1.BOOKID = PA.BOOKID AND PA1.FDRID = PA.FDRID) )
